name: CroSwap
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: CroSwap is an exclusive Automated Market Maker (AMM) based decentralized Exchange platform (DEX) designed to facilitate automated trading of decentralized finance tokens (DeFi) on multiple blockchain networks. CroSwap is designed to be the most user-friendly DeFi platform for users to be able to learn, swap, and earn high yields.
